verses.verse: O praise<WH1984> <WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> all<WH3605> ye nations:<WH1471> praise<WH7623> him, all<WH3605> ye people.<WH523>
For <WH3588> his merciful kindness<WH2617> is great<WH1396> toward<WH5921> us: and the truth<WH571> of the LORD<WH3068> endureth forever.<WH5769> Praise<WH1984> ye the LORD.<WH3050>
